TopicTitle: How do you view how many rep points you have on KSP forums?

Articles.Content: Hit the "My Profile" in the upper right corner of your screen, then hit the reputation tab.

> 
> Hit the "My Profile" in the upper right corner of your screen, then hit the reputation tab.

 I know this makes me look stupid but I can't find a reputation tab xD.

Ok, so you click "my profile"

in the middle of the page, there should be like posts and such. at the top of these, there are two layers of tabs. "my activity" and "all" should be highlighted. On the top row of tabs, all the way at the right is the reputation tab. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

The reputation tab in "My Profile" will only show up when you have 1 or more reputation points.

I hope this helps.

EDIT: Do you see it now?
